project_abstract.cdata: The project comprises construction, furnishing and equipping of 65 rural and 10 urban primary schools/community learning centers and extension of one and construction of two new primary teacher training colleges, equipment for rural literacy and community development programs, seven man-years equivalent of technical assistance and one man-year equivalent of fellowships and assistance to project administration.
